channel.title: Tiling Window Manager on Ahmed Al Balochi
channel.description: Recent content in Tiling Window Manager on Ahmed Al Balochi

item.title: 5 Essential Tools for Window Managers
item.description: Intro These are my favorite Window manager(WM) utilities. They will help you switch from the traditional Desktop Environments(DE). So, without further a due let’s begin. Terminal I know it’s a no-brainer, but a terminal is a key component of a WM setup. So, a great Terminal means a great Window manager session. Great GNU/Linux Terminals: Alacritty. My favorite Terminal Emulator Kitty. Terminator. Konsole. Gnome Terminal. Installation For Debian/Ubuntu
